Title: City by the Sea
Overview: Vincent LaMarca is a dedicated and well-respected New York City police detective who has gone to great lengths to distance himself from his past, but then makes the terrible discovery that his own son has fallen into a life of crime.
Tagline: When you're searching for a killer... the last suspect you want to see is your son.
production_companies: Warner Bros. Pictures, Epsilon Motion Pictures, Franchise Pictures, Brad Grey Pictures, Sea Breeze Productions Inc.
Cast: Robert De Niro, James Franco, Frances McDormand
